meanings.definition: To give great pleasure or satisfaction to
meanings.sent1: The children were delighting in the colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always delights her friends with her funny jokes.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was delighting in chasing its tail around in circles.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room, delighting everyone's ears with its beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The chef's special dessert was so delicious, it was delighting to everyone who tried it.

meanings.sent1: He was delighting in the peacefulness of the garden on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: She delights in spending time with her family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat was delighting in the warmth of the sunbeam coming through the window.
meanings.sent4: The artist was delighting in the vibrant colors of the sunset as inspiration for her painting.
meanings.sent5: The audience was delighting in the magician's tricks during the show.
